value:
It seems human greed and
warmongering are traits that persist
across many worlds. Fascinating...$k$pLet me see just what the power of
your many Heroes can achieve.

Parading this prince of light as some
devoted patriot knight... Nothing but a
grand deception.$k$pIt will not feed the citizens. If a country
is weak, its future holds only decay
and inevitable collapse.

Uncommon though your strength
may be, it is no match for the
Darksphere I hold.$k$pDo not forget your place.

It is my duty to elevate individuals
who demonstrate greatness.$k$pIf you do so, I will gladly welcome you
into the Archanean Imperial Army.

I feel as if I've freshly awoken from a
nightmare... Yet I long for battle still.
The spirit of the Coyote lives on.

You're gathering Heroes from across
many countries? Surely you don't
intend on defying my army with them.

The strong are rightfully
rewarded!

Some enemies remain. Ready
the army for our next strike!

It seems the shine of my weapon
has been dimmed...

Preparations are complete. Now,
eradicate the enemy!

My name is Hardin, Emperor of the
Holy Empire of Archanea.$k$pIf you do not wish to be scarred by my
fury, you will give me your name in
return.

There are countless kings and even
more nobles in the world, but most
lack the power to back up their status.$k$pMost of them simply rot in the mud of
their privilege.$k$pThese fools invite war to their
doorsteps and then send their own
citizens off to die.$k$pWhat point is there for such a country
to exist? Perhaps it would be best for
such places to be destroyed outright.$k$pThis very world included...$k$pHowever, through the fog of war I saw
a light. Archanea's true treasure...
I swore on my sword to protect her.$k$pIt was that purpose which showed me
that the country—the world—needed
to be cleansed.$k$pI needed to exile the fools and kill all
who opposed me.$k$pEven if that meant cutting down
someone entrusted with the Fire
Emblem itself.$k$pPardon me, what... What was I saying
just now? Right... I must annihilate
the rebels. Ready the army!
ふんっ！
Fool!
うああっ！
おのれ…！
Don't be so conceited!
Have you come to die?
You dare oppose me?
I'll run you through!
Prince Marth…
evil laugh
I rule my continent. I am the emperor of the Archanean Empire.
Further such actions will not be tolerated.
I will not show any mercy to those who oppose me.
I have no choice but to crush this world.
Ugh... My head... I remember something…
I...loved her... Until the very end...
There is only one true hero here... Allow me to teach you who that is.
So be it.
Detestable.
They'll perish.
